item.title: 404 ascii art hugo page
item.description: Demo: https://blog.andythecoder.com/404.html Created the ascii art using: http://patorjk.com/software/taag/#p=display&f=Doh&t=4%200%204 Wrap the ascii art in pre tag Hugo 404 page setup: https://gohugo.io/templates/404/

item.title: About
item.description: Welcome, although I expect no-one to read this. I write software, currently in c#. This blog, its content and opinions are my own.

item.title: Hello World
item.description: Welcome My intetion is to blog about tech that comes my way. This blog is running hugo and hosted as a github page (all free)
